entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , 100 Mile House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clinton 02:53 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: WNW 18 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow or rain near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over northern sections. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
